> This weapon falls into the [Maces & Flails](/Maces_%26_Flails "Maces & Flails") category. It is a one handed weapon.

**Sacred scourges** are a blessed weapon, slightly stronger than the [demon whip](/Demon_whip "Demon whip") it was formed from. Like [eudemon blades](/Eudemon_blade "Eudemon blade") and [trishulas](/Trishula "Trishula"), it always has the [holy wrath](/Holy_wrath "Holy wrath") brand.

You can create a sacred scourge through [the Shining One](/The_Shining_One "The Shining One")'s 6\* ability, or find them on [angels](/Angel "Angel") and [daevas](/Daeva "Daeva"). You can turn a sacred scourge back into a demon whip by using [Kikubaaqudgha](/Kikubaaqudgha "Kikubaaqudgha")'s or [Lugonu](/Lugonu "Lugonu")'s final ability to replace its brand with [pain](/Pain_\(brand\) "Pain (brand)") or [distortion](/Distortion "Distortion"), though this is rarely a good trade.

## Strategy

The strongest one-handed mace, at least in raw stats. The forced holy wrath brand makes it strong against evil opponents, though a [branded](/Brand "Brand") demon whip (or [eveningstar](/Eveningstar "Eveningstar")) is better against non-evil opponents.

Min delay 5 at skill 12
Hands 1H
Size Medium
Ranged? No
A blessed weapon, woven by the saints in Heaven and hated by the unholy. It is a favoured weapon of the Shining One's servants.
This weapon falls into the Maces & Flails category. It is a one handed weapon.

Sacred scourges are a blessed weapon, slightly stronger than the demon whip it was formed from. Like eudemon blades and trishulas, it always has the holy wrath brand.

You can create a sacred scourge through the Shining One's 6* ability, or find them on angels and daevas. You can turn a sacred scourge back into a demon whip by using Kikubaaqudgha's or Lugonu's final ability to replace its brand with pain or distortion, though this is rarely a good trade.

Strategy

The strongest one-handed mace, at least in raw stats. The forced holy wrath brand makes it strong against evil opponents, though a branded demon whip (or eveningstar) is better against non-evil opponents.
